name: leaf-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves an exeggcute into exeggutor, a gloom into vileplume, a nuzleaf into shiftry, a pansage into simisage, or a weepinbell into victreebel.
short_effect: Evolves an Exeggcute into Exeggutor, a Gloom into Vileplume, a Nuzleaf into Shiftry, a Pansage into Simisage, or a Weepinbell into Victreebel.

flavor_text.black_white: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a leaf pattern.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a leaf pattern.
